trans-unit.source: Represents a call to either static or an instance method.
trans-unit.target: 代表靜態或執行個體方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayIndex%2A>, or <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayIndex%2A> factory method to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayIndex%2A>，或<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayIndex%2A>factory 方法來建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> object is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>物件是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> object that represents indexing into a two-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>物件，表示成二維陣列編製索引。

trans-unit.source: The visitor to visit this node with.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽這個節點的造訪者。

trans-unit.source: Dispatches to the specific visit method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 分派給這個節點類型的特定造訪方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> calls the <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> 會呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />。

trans-unit.source: The result of visiting this node.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽這個節點的結果。

trans-unit.source: This default implementation for <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension> nodes calls <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個預設實作<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension>節點呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to call into a more specific method on a derived visitor class of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor> class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法來呼叫更特定類別上的方法在衍生的訪客的<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, it should still support unknown visitors by calling <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它應該仍然支援未知的訪客藉由呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of expressions that represent arguments of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 取得運算式集合，這些運算式代表所呼叫方法的引數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects which represent the arguments to the called method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，表示已呼叫方法的引數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> for the method to be called.
trans-unit.target: 取得要呼叫之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the called method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />，表示已呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node type of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的節點型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> that represents this expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the instance for instance method calls or null for static method calls.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，表示執行個體 (適用於執行個體方法呼叫) 或 Null (適用於靜態方法呼叫)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the receiving object of the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，表示方法的接收物件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> object's <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method%2A> property represents a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>物件的<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method%2A>屬性代表`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A>屬性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of arguments to the expression tree node.
trans-unit.target: 傳回運算式樹狀節點的引數數目。

trans-unit.source: You should not use this member.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: It is only public due to assembly refactoring, and it is used internally for performance optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 它只有在組件重構時為公用，且使用於內部以取得效能最佳化。

trans-unit.source: The number of arguments to the expression tree node as <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 運算式樹狀結構節點，做為引數數目<see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument at index, throwing if index is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於索引的引數，如果索引超出範圍則擲回引數。

trans-unit.source: You should not use this member.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: It is only public due to assembly refactoring, and it is used internally for performance optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 它只有在組件重構時為公用，且使用於內部以取得效能最佳化。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the static type of the expression that this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得此 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 代表之運算式的靜態類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Type" /> that represents the static type of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表運算式靜態類型的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 結果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 結果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
trans-unit.target: 建立類似這個運算式的新運算式，但使用提供的子系。

trans-unit.source: If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有子系都相同，則會傳回這個運算式。

trans-unit.source: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
trans-unit.target: 如果未變更任何子系，則為這個運算式；否則為已更新子系的運算式。
